snippet.title: Aftercharge - Official Launch Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Aftercharge is a 3 vs 3 competitive game pitting invisible robots against an invincible security squad in high-voltage tactical skirmishes. The robots must sneak around to punch down all the energy extractors on the site while the guards are tasked to spot the attackers, stop them and put an end to the uprising.

Join the December 14th Beta Weekend : http://www.afterchargekeys.com

Developed and published by Chainsawesome Games, Aftercharge will be releasing on January 10th 2019 on Steam and Xbox One.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/492760/Aftercharge/
Discord: http://www.discord.gg/aftercharge
